description:
Atsui is the brother of http://anidb.net/ch16827 [Samui], a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure] and part of the First Division of the Shinobi Allied Forces led by http://anidb.net/ch29709 [Darui].
Contrary to his sister, Atsui is a hot-headed and spirited man, preffering to attack his enemies head-on.
He has shoulder-length, blond hair and green eyes. His typical attire consists of a sleeveless version of the standard Kumogakure uniform, along with the village`s respective flak jacket and the kanji for "heat" (ç†±, netsu) tattooed on his left shoulder.
Source: Narutopedia
name: Atsui
